articles.author: Vinayakk Mohanarangan
articles.title: Badminton Asia C’ships semifinal blog: Satwik-Chirag become first Indian doubles pair to reach final - Scroll.in
articles.description: Recap of the semifinal featuring Satwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty and Olympic champions Lee Yang and Wang Chi-lin.
articles.content:
That will be all for this blog. See you all tomorrow.
Mens doubles final: It will be Teo Ee Yi and Ong Yew Sin vs Satwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty in the final, the world No 8 vs world No 6… [+6649 chars]

articles.author: Jeff Pao
articles.title: China's first Mars rover may sleep forever - Asia Times
articles.description: The first Chinese rover on Mars may not be able to restart itself after a longer-than-expected hibernation since last May, according to the Planetary Exploration of China (or Tianwen), a program co…
